description: This notification will be sent when
the gateway congestion level goes above
cegCongestionHighThreshold value.
This gives an indication that the gateway
is running at high congestion and at this
state it would reject all new calls.

event.Summary: Gateway congestion level is above high treshold value

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionHighThresholdNotif CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegVersion s EXAMPLE CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionDfpWeight u 9999 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionStatus i 1 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionHighThreshold u 9999

description: This notification will be sent when
the gateway congestion level goes above
cegCongestionLowThreshold value.
This gives an indication that the gateway
is running at low congestion at this
state it can accept only the high priority
calls and those with a lower priority would
be rejected.

event.Summary: Gateway congestion level is above low treshold value

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionLowThresholdNotif CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegVersion s EXAMPLE CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionDfpWeight u 9999 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionStatus i 1 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionLowThreshold u 9999 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionHighThreshold u 9999

description: This notification will be sent when
the gateway congestion level goes below
cegCongestionLowThreshold value.
This gives an indication that the gateway
has recovered from congestion and it can
accept all calls.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionClearedNotif CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegVersion s EXAMPLE CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionDfpWeight u 9999 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionStatus i 1 CISCO-EPC-GATEWAY-MIB::cegCongestionLowThreshold u 9999
